  • Constructor Details

    • Appointment

      public Appointment(int ai, String tt, String d, String l, String con, String ty, Timestamp s, Timestamp e, int cu, int u)
      Take data pulled from the database courtesy of the Query class and converts it to an Appointment for ease of use in populating views, working with times, etc. Uses private method to convert the database's UTC datetime (wrapped in a Timestamp) to time in the same timezone as the user.
      Parameters:
      ai - appointment ID
      tt - title of appointment
      d - short description of appointment
      l - location of appointment
      con - contact for the appointment
      ty - type of appointment
      s - start time of appointment
      e - end time of appointment
      cu - customer ID
      u - user ID

    • Appointment

      public Appointment()
      Default constructor Creates an object with most data members initialized to 0 or null string

    • Appointment

      public Appointment(int id, String ti, String ty, String d, Timestamp s, Timestamp e, int cus)
      Constructor for use with Reports view. Accepts a smaller number of initial fields for display.
      Parameters:
      id -
      ti -
      ty -
      d -
      s -
      e -
      cus -

    • setStart

      public void setStart(LocalDateTime ldt)
      Sets the start times in Appointment object to local date time, UTC time, and to SQL datetime in UTC
      Parameters:
      ldt - LocalDateTime to convert and set

    • setStartDB

      public void setStartDB(Timestamp ts)
      Sets the startDB time, based on a SQL datetime value. Converts that time to ZonedDateTime and to local time to set those corresponding data members
      Parameters:
      ts - SQL datetime value

    • setEnd

      public void setEnd(LocalDateTime ldt)
      Sets end time based on local time. Converts that time to UTC. From UTC it's able to set the zoned time member and the SQL datetime for writing the object to the database
      Parameters:
      ldt - Local end time

    • convertZDTtoLocal

      private LocalDateTime convertZDTtoLocal(ZonedDateTime zdt)
      Converts input to the equivalent local time (e.g. UTC time to American/Mountain time)
      Parameters:
      zdt - This is presumed to be UTC straight from the database
      Returns:
      LocalDateTime in the timezone of the user who is running the program

    • convertTStoZDT

      private ZonedDateTime convertTStoZDT(Timestamp ts)

    • convertYourLocaltoUTC

      private ZonedDateTime convertYourLocaltoUTC(LocalDateTime yourLocal)

    • isDuringOfficeHours

      public boolean isDuringOfficeHours()
      Based on created object,does a quick logical check to see if appointment start time is within office hours based on EST. Also checks if appointment end time is set after close of business hours.
      Returns:
      true if appointment time falls within office hours

    • hasConflict

      public boolean hasConflict()
      Runs a comparison in the database to see if the appointment has any conflicts with existing appointments.
      Returns:
      true if there there is a conflict
